channel.title: CTF on BSidesTLV 2020
channel.description: Recent content in CTF on BSidesTLV 2020

item.title: 2020 CTF
item.description: Hall of Fame 1st Place 2nd Place 3rd Place Honorable mention Is it you? Or you? Maybe you? Adam again? Our Team Reut Menashe Tomer Zait Roei Sherman Nimrod Levy Vera Mens Yahav Azran Daniel Abeles Ezra Caltum Guy Barnhart-Magen Lavie BB Guy Beck Omer Cohen Resources We will update the CTF website and challenge links closer to the event

item.title: 2019 CTF
item.description: Hall of Fame 1st Place 2nd Place 3rd Place Honorable mention, again :-) Dan (dm0n) JCTF YaakovCohen88 Schtrudel Narcissus Moshe Wagner Israel Erlich Dvd848 EY (3rN357&Y0un9) Adam D Our Team Reut Menashe Roei Sherman Nimrod Levy El Profesor (w/Nimrod)

item.title: 2018 CTF
item.description: Hall of Fame 1st Place 2nd Place 3rd Place Honorable mention reclass (Nir Lavi and Intel’s team) babyr00t (known also as dm0n) JCTF (@schturdel, @nmontag, @YaakovCohen88 and Israel Erlich) Adam Donenfeld One of our volunteers was kind enough to deliver a care package to Adam Donenfeld – while not eligible to win, he did solve everything first.

item.title: 2016 CTF
item.description: At the 2016 CTF was hosted and sponsored by Cellebrite github: cool story bro if you have any writeups or more information, please let me know!
